properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters OF Northwestern Puerto Rico out 10 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 12 at 10:12AM AST until February 14 at 2:00AM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...Rough and hazardous marine conditions will prevail until
Friday...

.A surface high pressure across the central Atlantic will yield a
fresh to locally strong easterly wind flow across the regional
waters, creating hazardous marine conditions that will increase
through Friday.

* WHAT...Seas between 5 to 8 feet with occasional seas up to 10
feet. East winds between 15 and 20 knots with locally higher
winds up to 25 knots and higher gusts.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters of Northwestern Puerto Rico out 10 NM.

* WHEN...From 8 AM Thursday to 2 AM AST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THURSDAY TO 2 AM AST FRIDAY
